GameConditionDef.label: flicking lights
GameConditionDef.description: An eerie breeze flows over the land and lights begin to flicker... is this a sign of things to come?
GameConditionDef.endMessage: The lights have returned to normal.
GameConditionDef.letterText: The sky plunges into darkness and lights all around the colony begin to flicker on and off. Moods may shift and tempers may rise.
